amendment.description: To ensure appropriate prioritization, spectrum planning, and interagency coordination to support the Internet of Things.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2231 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2231 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Fischer to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184) To ensure appropriate prioritization, spectrum planning, and interagency coordination to support the Internet of Things.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2231 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Fischer to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2231 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
